meanings.sent1: I am refiltering the coffee to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: She decided to refilter the water to remove any impurities.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally adding too much sugar, she had to refilter the solution.
meanings.sent4: The idea went through a process of refiltering before being approved.
meanings.sent5: Refiltering the data helped us find the error quickly.

meanings.definition: To pass through a filter again.
meanings.sent1: The chef is refiltering the broth to make it clearer.
meanings.sent2: It is important to refilter the oil to ensure it is clean for reuse.
meanings.sent3: She had to refilter the juice after finding pulp in it.
meanings.sent4: The information needs to go through refiltering to be more accurate.
meanings.sent5: Refiltering the tea leaves resulted in a smoother flavor.
